meanings.sent1: The opsomath was excited to start learning new things at an older age.
meanings.sent2: The opsomath attended university for the first time at the age of sixty.
meanings.sent3: The opsomath decided to take up painting as a hobby after retiring.
meanings.sent4: Becoming an opsomath in gardening, she cultivated a beautiful late-blooming garden.
meanings.sent5: The opsomath's thirst for knowledge was insatiable, driving them to explore various subjects.
